titleStmt.title: A quartron of reasons of Catholike religion, with as many briefe reasons of refusall: By Tho. Hill
titleStmt.author: Hill, Edmund Thomas, ca. 1563-1644.

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; actual imprint from STC.
Title page has cut of crucifixion--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
